meanings.definition: Most resembling steel in strength or hardness.
meanings.sent1: The knight wore the steeliest armor for battle.
meanings.sent2: The skyscraper was built with the steeliest beams to withstand strong winds.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's determination to climb the steeliest slide was admirable.
meanings.sent4: Her resolve was as steely as the steeliest sword.
meanings.sent5: The steeliest resolve can overcome any obstacle.

meanings.sent1: She had the steeliest will to succeed in her goals.
meanings.sent2: The team showed their steeliest determination to win the championship.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat showed the steeliest determination to catch the laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: His resolve was as steely as the steeliest warrior in battle.
meanings.sent5: The steeliest determination can lead to great achievements.
